text: Regulatory effects of <extra_id_0> interleukin-11 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> during acute lung inflammatory injury .

The role of <extra_id_0> interleukin-11 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> IL-11 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) was evaluated in the IgG immune complex model of acute lung injury in rats .
<extra_id_0> IL-11 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> mRNA and protein were both up-regulated during the course of this inflammatory response .

Exogenously administered <extra_id_0> IL-11 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> substantially reduced , in a dose - dependent manner , the intrapulmonary accumulation of neutrophils and the lung vascular leak of albumin .

These in vivo anti-inflammatory effects of <extra_id_0> IL-11 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> were associated with reduced NF-kappaB activation in lung , reduced levels of <extra_id_0> tumor necrosis factor alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> TNF-alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) in bronchoalveolar lavage ( BAL ) fluids , and diminished up-regulation of lung vascular <extra_id_0> ICAM-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .

text: It is interesting that <extra_id_0> IL-11 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> did not affect BAL fluid content of the CXC chemokines , <extra_id_0> macrophage inflammatory protein-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ( <extra_id_0> MIP-2 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> ) and cytokine - inducible neutrophil chemoattractant ( CINC ) ; the presence of <extra_id_0> IL-11 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> did not affect these chemokines .

text: However , BAL content of C5a was reduced by <extra_id_0> IL-11 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .

These data indicate that <extra_id_0> IL-11 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> is a regulatory cytokine in the lung and that , like other members of this family , its anti-inflammatory properties appear to be linked to its suppression of NF-kappaB activation , diminished production of <extra_id_0> TNF-alpha <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> , and reduced up-regulation of lung vascular <extra_id_0> ICAM-1 <extra_id_2> Protein <extra_id_1> .
